name: chartdb
description: ChartDB helps development teams document and manage software architecture using visual diagrams and Markdown. It features version control integration and self-hostable deployment for engineering organizations and teams.
features: Architecture Documentation: Visual diagrams for software architecture. Clear documentation.
Markdown Support: Document with markdown alongside diagrams. Rich content.
Version Control: Git integration for tracking changes. Historical record.
Team Collaboration: Multiple users can contribute to documentation. Shared knowledge.
Visual Diagrams: Create clear architecture visualizations. Better understanding.
Self-Hosted: Keep architecture docs on your infrastructure. Data security.
Engineering Focus: Built for development teams and organizations. Developer-friendly.
